origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketResearchAPI.collect_data', 'description': 'This function collects market data based on the specified sector and data type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of the market, e.g., services, manufacturing.'}, {'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to collect, e.g., market_size, trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The collected market data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketResearchAPI.collect_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'services', 'data_type'是'market_size'.
